text:
Happy Holidays y'all! Thanks everyone for the replies :orange_heart:

Thanks <@UJAPS2K4N> for bringing all these amazing people to share their expertise as well!

The case is more of what <@U26BLKGE4> described. The agency claims that not all the HS cookies are removed after the user opt-out.
As I said, I hadn't had a lot of experience with cookie banner problems before, so maybe there is something I don't know, who knows, right :woman-shrugging::skin-tone-2:
Thanks everyone for joining the convo!

> HS does need a few cookies active even in that state
Is there anything in HS documentation about those specific cookies that HS still needs?
Thanks <@U26BLKGE4> so much for the link!

Anyone ever had primary and secondary domains switched to redirect domains for no reason?  We had a client that had a website and landing pages all go down last week (12/17/2024) as the domains were switched to Redirect domains.  HubSpot support doesnt seem to have any idea what happened..all they could provide us with were log entries from 2022/2023 when the domains were first created.
